verses.verse: And I heard <S%G191><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> from the temple, <S%G3485><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> "Go <S%G5217><s%> and pour <S%G1632><s%> out the seven <S%G2033><s%> bowls <S%G5357><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> into the earth. <S%G1093><s%>"

And the first <S%G4413><s%> [angel] went <S%G565><s%> and poured <S%G1632><s%> out his bowl <S%G5357><s%> into the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and it became <S%G1096><s%> a loathsome <S%G2556><s%> and malignant <S%G4190><s%> sore <S%G1668><s%> upon the men <S%G444><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%> and who worshiped <S%G4352><s%> his image. <S%G1504><s%>

And the second <S%G1208><s%> [angel] poured <S%G1632><s%> out his bowl <S%G5357><s%> into the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and it became <S%G1096><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> [that] of a dead <S%G3498><s%> man; <S%G3498><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> living <S%G2222><s%> thing <S%G5590><s%> in the sea <S%G2281><s%> died. <S%G599><s%>

And the third <S%G5154><s%> [angel] poured <S%G1632><s%> out his bowl <S%G5357><s%> into the rivers <S%G4215><s%> and the springs <S%G4077><s%> of waters; <S%G5204><s%> and they became <S%G1096><s%> blood. <S%G129><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the waters <S%G5204><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Righteous <S%G1342><s%> art <S%G1510><s%> Thou, who art <S%G1510><s%> and who <S%G3588><s%> wast, <S%G1510><s%> O Holy <S%G3741><s%> One, <S%G3741><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> Thou didst judge <S%G2919><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things; <S%G3778><s%>

for they poured <S%G1632><s%> out the blood <S%G129><s%> of saints <S%G40><s%> and prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> them blood <S%G129><s%> to drink. <S%G4095><s%> They deserve <S%G514><s%> it. "

And I heard <S%G191><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> O Lord <S%G2962><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> true <S%G228><s%> and righteous <S%G1342><s%> are Thy judgments. <S%G2920><s%>"

And the fourth <S%G5067><s%> [angel] poured <S%G1632><s%> out his bowl <S%G5357><s%> upon the sun; <S%G2246><s%> and it was given <S%G1325><s%> to it to scorch <S%G2739><s%> men <S%G444><s%> with fire. <S%G4442><s%>

And men <S%G444><s%> were scorched <S%G2739><s%> with fierce <S%G3173><s%> heat; <S%G2738><s%> and they blasphemed <S%G987><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> who has <S%G2192><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> plagues; <S%G4127><s%> and they did not repent, <S%G3340><s%> so as to give <S%G1325><s%> Him glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And the fifth <S%G3991><s%> [angel] poured <S%G1632><s%> out his bowl <S%G5357><s%> upon the throne <S%G2362><s%> of the beast; <S%G2342><s%> and his kingdom <S%G932><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> darkened; <S%G4656><s%> and they gnawed <S%G3145><s%> their tongues <S%G1100><s%> because <S%G1537><s%> of pain, <S%G4192><s%>

and they blasphemed <S%G987><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> because <S%G1537><s%> of their pains <S%G4192><s%> and their sores; <S%G1668><s%> and they did not repent <S%G3340><s%> of their deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

And the sixth <S%G1623><s%> [angel] poured <S%G1632><s%> out his bowl <S%G5357><s%> upon the great <S%G3173><s%> river, <S%G4215><s%> the Euphrates; <S%G2166><s%> and its water <S%G5204><s%> was dried <S%G3583><s%> up, that the way <S%G3598><s%> might be prepared <S%G2090><s%> for the kings <S%G935><s%> from the east. <S%G395><s%> <S%G2246><s%>

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> [coming] out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the dragon <S%G1404><s%> and out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%> and out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the false <S%G5578><s%> prophet, <S%G5578><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> frogs; <S%G944><s%>

for they are spirits <S%G4151><s%> of demons, <S%G1140><s%> performing <S%G4160><s%> signs, <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> go <S%G1607><s%> out to the kings <S%G935><s%> of the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G3625><s%> to gather <S%G4863><s%> them together <S%G4863><s%> for the war <S%G4171><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>

(" Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I am coming <S%G2064><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a thief. <S%G2812><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is the one who stays <S%G1127><s%> awake <S%G1127><s%> and keeps <S%G5083><s%> his garments, <S%G2440><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> he walk <S%G4043><s%> about <S%G4043><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%> and men see <S%G991><s%> his shame. <S%G808><s%>" )
And they gathered <S%G4863><s%> them together <S%G4863><s%> to the place <S%G5117><s%> which in Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Har-Magedon. <S%G717><s%>

And the seventh <S%G1442><s%> [angel] poured <S%G1632><s%> out his bowl <S%G5357><s%> upon the air; <S%G109><s%> and a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of the temple <S%G3485><s%> from the throne, <S%G2362><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "It is done. <S%G1096><s%>"

And there were flashes <S%G796><s%> of lightning <S%G796><s%> and sounds <S%G5456><s%> and peals <S%G1027><s%> of thunder; <S%G1027><s%> and there was a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> such <S%G3634><s%> as there had not been <S%G1096><s%> since <S%G575><s%> <S%G3739><s%> man <S%G444><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> to be upon the earth, <S%G1093><s%> so <S%G5082><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> an earthquake <S%G4578><s%> [was it, and] so <S%G3779><s%> mighty. <S%G3173><s%>

And the great <S%G3173><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> was split <S%G1096><s%> into three <S%G5140><s%> parts, <S%G3313><s%> and the cities <S%G4172><s%> of the nations <S%G1484><s%> fell. <S%G4098><s%> And Babylon <S%G897><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> was remembered <S%G3403><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> her the cup <S%G4221><s%> of the wine <S%G3631><s%> of His fierce <S%G2372><s%> wrath. <S%G3709><s%>
And every <S%G3956><s%> island <S%G3520><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> away, <S%G5343><s%> and the mountains <S%G3735><s%> were not found. <S%G2147><s%>

And huge <S%G3173><s%> hailstones, <S%G5464><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G5006><s%> hundred <S%G5006><s%> pounds <S%G5006><s%> each, came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> upon men; <S%G444><s%> and men <S%G444><s%> blasphemed <S%G987><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> because <S%G1537><s%> of the plague <S%G4127><s%> of the hail, <S%G5464><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> its plague <S%G4127><s%> was extremely <S%G4970><s%> severe. <S%G3173><s%>
